description: Shows detailed stats of a SAP HANA database. Brought to you by SUSE.

panels.description: Percentage of Total Used RAM over the HANA Allocation Limit.
panels.title: RAM Usage

panels.description: Average percent of CPU usage based on usage type.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Average CPU busy time of all cores.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Details HANA on how HANA uses the filesystem in its various directories
panels.title: Filesystem usage

panels.description: Details HANA on how HANA uses the filesystem in its various directories
panels.title: File system details

panels.description: Alerts raised from the HANA database internal alerting system
panels.title: Alert details
System Replication Used Async Log Shipping Buffer

panels.description: System Replication Takeover history. When the values of end time cannot be collected, the duration time is presented as -1 and the end time as "N/A"
panels.title: System Replication Takeover History

panels.description: I/O Throughput  per Disk in KB/Sec
panels.title: I/O Throughput

panels.description: average queue length of the requests that were issued to the Disk Device
panels.title: Queue Length (Number of Requests)

title: SAP HANA
